description: Try our easy to follow Checkerboard Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Checkerboard Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 1 layer on a cake board, securing it in place by dabbing a little buttercream onto the board. Spread a layer of buttercream on top with an offset spatula. Alternating the coloured layers, repeat the layers, spreading each with buttercream. Apply a thin coat of buttercream over the entire cake. Chill for 15 minutes.
